keyword: how many calories are in 10 grapes
title: How Many Calories Are in 10 Grapes?
meta_description: Learn how many calories are in 10 grapes – about 30 kcal total – with a full nutrient breakdown per grape, totals, and variations for better tracking.
h1: How Many Calories Are in 10 Grapes?
assumptions: Average seedless red grapes (~5 g each), raw with edible skin, fresh.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by grape variety, size, ripeness, and growing conditions. Weigh for accuracy; values are approximate.

quick_answer.text: 10 average grapes provide about 30 kcal, mainly from natural sugars with minimal fat or protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Green grapes (slightly lower sugar content per grape)
Add 1 tsp yogurt coating per grape

faqs.q: How many calories in one grape?
faqs.a: About 3 kcal for an average-sized grape.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in 10 grapes?
faqs.a: Approximately 9 g carbs, including 0.5 g fiber and 8 g natural sugars.
They contain natural sugars (8 g in 10 grapes), but are low-calorie overall.

faqs.q: How do red and green grapes compare in calories?
faqs.a: Similar; red grapes average 3 kcal each, green slightly less at ~2.5 kcal.
